claim: A priest of a parish in the city of Madrid has been expedient and his case will be studied by the Catholic Church after having been denounced by some parishioners. Apparently the priest had a small portable television in the confessional, to watch the Madrid matches when they coincided with the confessional schedules. Some parishioners were surprised by a light coming from inside the confessional, as well as by small jumps and drowning screams that the priest suddenly gave, as if he were looking after something else. Finally in an oversight of the parish priest they dared to inspect the cabin discovering the television. The priest, once discovered, defended himself from the accusations.'I can perfectly do two things at once, attend confessions and watch television, it's not that hard. What is not very Christian is to pretend that Madrid plays Champions and that I miss it'
